aiDisclosure.title: AI Disclosure
aiDisclosure.statement: This platform uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) to personalize your learning.
aiDisclosure.howWeUseAIText: AI is used to provide personalized tutoring, adaptive feedback, and learning recommendations. Critical decisions remain under human control.
aiDisclosure.aiLimitationsText: AI is not perfect. It can make mistakes and should not replace human judgment. We encourage critical questions and feedback.
aiDisclosure.humanOversightText: All critical AI functions are supervised by qualified teachers and educational specialists.

withdrawal.title: Consent Withdrawal
withdrawal.howToWithdraw: You can withdraw consent at any time by accessing your privacy settings.
withdrawal.withdrawalSteps:
1. Sign in to your account
2. Go to Settings > Privacy and Consent
3. Select which consents you want to withdraw
4. Confirm the withdrawal request
5. Your data will be deleted per GDPR regulations
withdrawal.emailWithdrawal: Alternatively, you can send us a formal withdrawal request email.
withdrawal.consequencesText: Withdrawing certain consents may prevent access to specific platform features.
